about_the_game:
We didn't have enough money to make a living and continue development, so we had to look for investment, but they saw how poorly it sold and wanted us to make a new game. In order to live we have to make compromises, but I will not give up this game, the following is the gameplay and story that I plan to finally present, I can only use my spare time to make, the final completion time is expected in early 27, I am sorry to have to keep you waiting for a long time, I have reduced the price, you can buy at your discretion.

1. Free construction

Free to build houses and citadel equipment, build your doomsday shelter, defend against the tide of corpses, and spend the night safe

2. Make tools

Create tools and powerful weapons to deal with the apocalypse of zombies and crises

3. Cook food

Grow crops and cook food to sustain themselves and the women

4. Enrich the vehicle

Including carts, sports cars, trucks, tanks, helicopters and many other different types of vehicles, for you to ride the apocalypse and defend against powerful mutated monsters

5. Many monsters

Expect more than ten different monsters with different characteristics, and at certain times, a wave of corpses will attack your base

6. Enrich the story

Take on a fantasy adventure with 7 beautiful women with different personalities, mesmerize them and help you become stronger

7. Character development

After the apocalypse, a special energy substance is produced, which causes the monsters to mutate, and their head generate a substance called magic Crystal, which can be killed to obtain this substance, and enhance their own and other character attributes

8. Final outcome

In the end, you will learn the truth of the apocalypse, become the savior, save all mankind, and live happily with your women

content_descriptors.notes: There are instances of female nudity, combat violence, but not sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
